name: The Dead Parkour
description:
• Test your reflexes!
  • It's full of annoying traps!
  • Don't you feel like you can play better next time every time your character dies?
  • The various traps will keep driving you to death!
  • Imagine how good it will feel to overcome those traps and finally clear the game!
  • Once you get your first clear, why don't you aim for clearing the game at one go?
